coreQueryPageProvider.name: FIND_CATEGORIES_PP

coreQueryPageProvider.name: FIND_CATEGORY_IN_CATEGORIES_PP
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * from FVCategory where ecm:ancestorId=? and ecm:isVersion=0 and ecm:isTrashed=0

coreQueryPageProvider.name: FIND_WORDS_WITH_CATEGORY_PP
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: select * from FVWord where fv-word:categories = ? and ecm:isVersion=0 and ecm:isTrashed=0

coreQueryPageProvider.name: FIND_WORDS_WITH_CATEGORY_PROXIED_PP
